name: @saekitominaga/customelements-tooltip-trigger
description: A custom element that triggers to call the tooltip UI.

scripts._ts-watch:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/TooltipTrigger.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.mjs -- terser dist/TooltipTrigger.mjs -o dist/TooltipTrigger.min.mjs -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map base=dist,filename=Tooltip.min.mjs,includeSources
scripts._ts-watch:compress-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.min.mjs -- brotlin compress dist/TooltipTrigger.min.mjs -m 1
scripts._ts-watch:dts-minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TooltipTrigger.mjs.d.ts -- cpy dist/TooltipTrigger.mjs.d.ts dist --rename=TooltipTrigger.min.mjs.d.ts

author: Saeki Tominaga
